as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。

:open.description: The controlled open state of the dialog. Can be binded as `v-model:open`.
:open.description_zh: 对话框的受控打开状态。可以绑定为 `v-model:open`。

defaultOpen.description: The open state of the dialog when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.
defaultOpen.description_zh: 对话框在初始渲染时的打开状态。在不需要控制其打开状态时使用。

events.name: update:open
events.description: Event handler called when the open state of the dialog changes.
events.description_zh: 当对话框的打开状态更改时调用的事件处理程序。
